ticker.dx: (0.005 + RAIN*0.01) * sin(AGE * 0.05 + CUSTOM * 3) + 0.005 * CUSTOM - ((PLAYER_X - POS_X) / (DISTANCE_SQUARED + 1)) * min(max(2 - sqrt(DISTANCE_SQUARED), 0), 1) * 0.15 + RAIN*0.025
ticker.dz: (0.005 + RAIN*0.01) * cos(AGE * 0.05 + CUSTOM * 3) + 0.005 * CUSTOM - ((PLAYER_Z - POS_Z) / (DISTANCE_SQUARED + 1)) * min(max(2 - sqrt(DISTANCE_SQUARED), 0), 1) * 0.15
